channel.title: Shooting games with guns on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Shooting games with guns on Game6r

item.title: Transmorpher 3 Ancient Alien
item.description: One of the air force bases located in Latin America was attacked by aliens. You have to repulse enemy attacks and destroy the maximum number of “green men”. At your disposal there is a huge double-barreled machine gun, the shells of which are unable to stop even the space armor of the aliens.
